description:
Description :
        Mukai Takumi is the head of her own Motorcycle Gang, but a chance encounter with a certain person ends up leading her down the path of becoming an Idol.A manga spin off of the IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls series of games starring the Delinquent turned Idol, Mukai Takumi.
